I like sorting champions by **class/role** rather than by commonly played position. I do not want to lose this option. It is the **best way to sort** out common traits and play-styles. This presents much better clarity to see what is good for your team or what you prefer to play.

**PLEASE DO NOT MAKE THIS SPECIFIC CHANGE.** "Filter by position [7.19]"

If Riot decides to make both available, that's fine. Otherwise, keep the option to sort by class role rather than by **popular position** choices. Beholding to popularity **limits creative choices** and **worsens players' understandings** of intended play-styles.
